content: is it possible for a tape measurer to be any cuter than this i don t think so and she s sure to brighten up any sewing crocheting quilting or knitting project you are currently needing to measure the bears right ear hides the tail of the tape measurer just press the center of her back and voila the tape measurer curls back inside all you need to make this pattern is a round tape measurer about 2 1/4 inches in diameter - or across and tiny amounts of scrap yarn i used acrylic worsted weight yarn and a g hook i used very small amounts of yarn to make these so it s a great stashbuster a quick easy project for those who need instant gratification finished items not recommended for children for several reasons - one this item has googles eyes which can be chewed off and pose a choking hazard and two my kids have broken more tape measurers than i care to remember by pulling them as far out as they can and then some
